name: Alice Wonderland
bio: Curiouser and curiouser! Passionate about AI ethics and community building. Always up for a good discussion on emerging tech.

name: Bob The Builder
bio: Can we fix it? Yes, we can! Full-stack developer with a love for open-source projects and sustainable tech solutions.

name: Charlie Brown
bio: Good grief! Exploring the world of UI/UX design. Believer in simple, intuitive interfaces. Occasionally flies kites.

name: Diana Prince
bio: Champion for truth and justice in the digital realm. Interested in cybersecurity, digital privacy, and empowering online communities.

name: Edward Scissorhands
bio: A bit shy, but creative. Enjoys crafting beautiful things, both digital and physical. Still learning the ropes of social media.
